game.name: DanLing: LIMBO
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Bōlíng: Beyond Samsara is a 3D shooter Roguelite that combines platform-jumping. Grappling hooks serve as the primary traversal tool while doubling as weapons to strike enemies. Its core feature is a ball-physics simulation system that enables fluid character movement and dynamic combat.
